section.name: name
section.description: hag - an HCLI AI agent for hag coding with git in the terminal.

section.name: description
section.description: hag is an HCLI (hypertext command line interface) that enhancees AI agents with the ability to make use of additional tools.

command.name: git
command.description: The "git" command allows for interaction with git code repositories.

command.name: search
command.description: The "search" command allows for web page digest.

section.name: name
section.description: git - allows for interaction with git repositories.

section.name: description
section.description: The "git" command allows for interaction with git code repositories.

command.name: sig
command.description: The "sig" command takes a file path to a git repository and distils out a useful and compact representation of its salient features.

section.name: name
section.description: sig - distils out a useful git repository structure for large language models.

section.name: description
section.description: The "sig" command takes a file path to a git repository and distils out a useful and compact representation of its salient features.

section.name: name
section.description: search - returns a simple website digest.

section.name: description
section.description: The "search" command takes a http or https parameter and returns website digest.
